description: A schema for missions in STFC.

objectives.title: Meet the Romulan Informant on Moya.

title: The root schema

faction.description: To which faction the missions belongs to.
faction.title: The faction schema

recommended_ops.description: (Optional) Operations level recommended to complete this mission.
recommended_ops.title: The recommended_ops schema

objectives.description: List of all objectives in this mission.
objectives.title: The objectives schema

obj_id.description: Numeric id of the objective to identify the objectives flow.
obj_id.title: The obj_id schema

examples: Meet the Romulan Informant on Moya.
title.title: The title schema

main_objective.description: (Optional) Holds a reference to the main objective when this is a child objective based on a 'choose' type objective.
main_objective.title: The main_objective schema

task.description: List of all types of tasks. The objective can have one of these, based on task type.
task.title: The task schema

$ref.description: (Optional) A destination reference to the systems file. When not implemented, the destination is the player' home system.
$ref.title: The $ref schema

$ref.description: (Optional) A reference to the systems file where the target is. When not implemented, the destination is the player' home system.
$ref.title: The $ref schema

$ref.description: (Optional) A reference to the systems file where the target is. When not implemented, the destination is the player' home system.
$ref.title: The $ref schema

value.description: The amount of this resource required.
value.title: The value schema

options.description: List of all options to choose from.
options.title: The options schema

option_id.description: The id of the option, used to sort the options.
option_id.title: The option_id schema

rewards.description: Reference to the rewards able to gain by choosing this option.
rewards.title: The rewards schema

$ref.description: Reference to the rewards property by reward_id.
$ref.title: The $ref schema

rewards.description: List of all rewards for this mission. When the mission has no 'choose' type tasks, only one list item is used to describe all rewards. Otherwhise all tasks are split by an id.
rewards.title: The rewards schema

reward_id.description: (Optional) Id of the reward. Only used when the mission has at least one 'choose' type task.
reward_id.title: The reward_id schema

resources.description: List of all resources gained by completing the mission.
resources.title: The resources schema

value.description: The amount of this resource gained.
value.title: The value schema

materials.description: List of all materials gained by completing the mission.
materials.title: The materials schema

grade.description: The grade in stars of the material.
grade.title: The grade schema

value.description: The amount of this material gained.
value.title: The value schema

others.description: List of all other rewards gained.
others.title: The others schema

value.description: The amount of this other reward gained.
value.title: The value schema

previous_mission.description: (Optional) Reference to the previous mission in this chain, if any.
previous_mission.title: The previous_mission schema

$ref.description: Reference to the previous mission file.
$ref.title: The $ref schema

next_mission.description: (Optional) Reference to the next mission in this chain, if any.
next_mission.title: The next_mission schema

$ref.description: Reference to the next mission file.
$ref.title: The $ref schema
